DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label clinical study ass single-dose PK eravacycline subject renal impairment healthy subject conduct approximately 2 site United States . This study include 21-day Screening Period , 5-day Treatment Period , End Study Visit occur approximately 2 week ( ±2 day ) study drug administration . Approximately 12 subject enrol : 6 subject ESRD 6 healthy subject normal renal function . Healthy subject match renally impaired subject gender , age , body mass index ( BMI ) . All subject administer single IV dose eravacycline ( 1.5 mg/kg ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Open-Label Study Assess Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics Eravacycline Subjects With End Stage Renal Disease Healthy Subjects
